attributes.action: Ban recreational drug takers from being MPs
attributes.additional_details:
It has come to light that many current and past MPs have allegedly used recreational drugs, even while being in charge of government departments.
These people are making decisions affecting our lives. They have banned other recreational drug users, no matter how long ago, from other professions.
They are dangerous hypocrites.
attributes.background:
Anyone who currently, or in the past, have taken recreational drugs, should be banned from being an MP.
In addition, a robust disciplinary panel be set up with powers to immediately suspend and then expel any member found to be in breach.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs to be sacked.
